PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08552018-06-21,  ,  HC,  CFIA,  ,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectCFIA-PIPSC - Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada **Collective Agreement** Veterinary Medicine (VM) Bargaining Unit.
PrecisOrder authorizing the CANADIAN FOOD INSPECTION AGENCY to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA (PIPSC) on behalf of thel employees of the Agency in the Veterinary Medicine Bargaining Unit, on January 18, 2018. The agreement replaces an agreement which expired on September 30, 2014 and is for a duration of four (4) years expiring on September 30, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
